casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jermaine Antwan TART 427P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 15, 2017 *580Sarah Holladay, Attorney at Law, for Tart, Jermaine Antwan. Michael T. Henry, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of December 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2017."
